passives.effects: At 55 minutes, this turret begins to malfunction, losing {{as|armor}} and {{as|magic resist}}. After 5 minutes, it will start breaking down, losing an increasing percentage of its {{as|{{sti|health|'''maximum''' health}}}} every 30 seconds.

effects_structured.raw: At 55 minutes, this turret begins to malfunction, losing {{as|armor}} and {{as|magic resist}}. After 5 minutes, it will start breaking down, losing an increasing percentage of its {{as|{{sti|health|'''maximum''' health}}}} every 30 seconds.
